doc.title: Anabolic Frolic: The Rave Experience
doc.plot: Anabolic Frolic, the best selling DJ behind the Happy2bHardcore series and promoter of the world famous Hullabaloo rave events, invites you into this secret world of music, fashion, culture and community unlike any other. Captured live at the 10 year anniversary Hullabaloo rave, this may be the last time an event like this will ever be seen. For the first and only time, get an unprecedented look at a real Hullabaloo rave and the one-of-a-kind Anabolic Frolic experience.
